alert.note: Alert for Allen; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 1:43PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Rapides, eastern Vernon and north central Allen Parishes through 215 PM CST... At 143 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gardner to near Cravens. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Boyce, Elizabeth, Alexandria International Airport, Hineston, Lena, Pitkin, Ball, Tioga, Timber Trails, Flatwoods, Otis, Elmer, Kingsville, Sieper, Lacamp, Fullerton, Clifton and Leander. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 76 and 80, and between mile markers 82 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
